en.INTERNET_DISCONNECTED:
We're sorry, we can't seem to connect to the Jackbox Games servers.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly.
en.ROOM_DESTROYED:
We're sorry, a network error occurred and your room was destroyed.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly.
en.SOCKET_DISCONNECTED: We're sorry, we've lost your connection to the Jackbox Games servers.
en.TIMEOUT:
We're sorry, we can't seem to connect to the Jackbox Games servers.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly.
en.USER_DISCONNECT: We're sorry, the server has disconnected you. Please try again.
en.LOST_LICENSE: We're sorry, we lost the license for this content!
en.STEAM_ERROR: We're sorry, we couldn't validate your Steam license.
en.TWITCH_PRIME_ERROR: We're sorry, we couldn't validate your Twitch Prime license.
en.LOST_DLC: We're sorry, the license for your DLC could not be found. Returning you to the menu...
en.BACK_TO_PACK_DESCRIPTION: Exit back to the Party Pack
en.CONNECTING_DELAY:
This is taking a while...
Please check your internet connection.
en.JOIN_ON_YOUR_DEVICE: on your mobile device to join in
en.FULL_SCREEN_DESCRIPTION: Make the game take up the full...screen.
en.VOLUME_DESCRIPTION: Make the game LOUD or QUIET.
en.VOLUME_HOST_DESCRIPTION: Turn down the host if you want to be confused and lonely.
en.VOLUME_SFX_DESCRIPTION: We worked hard on these fart sounds, but you can turn them down if you want.
en.VOLUME_MUSIC_DESCRIPTION: Turn down our great music. We don't mind.
en.FAMILY_FRIENDLY_DESCRIPTION: Turn on to avoid the most provocative content...from the game. We can't control the players.
en.AUDIENCE_MODE_DESCRIPTION: Turn on to allow non-players to join and affect the game.
en.TWITCH_REQUIRED_DESCRIPTION: Require players to be logged into Twitch to join the game. Recommended only for streamed games.
en.MANUAL_CENSORING_DESCRIPTION: Allows the VIP (first player in) to censor players' answers.
en.POSTGAME_SHARING_DESCRIPTION: Allow players to optionally share answers and scores from the game on social media.
en.START_GAMEPAD_DESCRIPTION: Games must be started with controller, not from player devices.
en.HIDE_ROOM_CODE_DESCRIPTION: Allow room code to be hidden to prevent players from joining early. Recommended only for streamed games.
en.SESSION_STATS_DESCRIPTION: Stats from the current play session (These stats will reset when you quit the game.)
en.TWITCH_STATS_DESCRIPTION: Stats from Twitch-locked games (These stats are saved even after you quit the game.)
en.EXTENDED_TIMERS_DESCRIPTION: Enable very long timers. Recommended only for streamed games.
en.GATHER_TWIST_INSTRUCTIONS: Twist the comment on your device.
en.GATHER_RESPONSE_INSTRUCTIONS: Please answer the question on your device.
en.VOTE_INSTRUCTIONS: Vote for the person who looks the most ridiculous.
en.SKIP_TUTORIAL: Press this to skip the tutorial...
en.GATHER_TWIST_DONE: Thanks. We hope you're happy with yourself.
en.GATHER_RESPONSE_DONE: Thanks. The internet needed your opinion.
en.PLAYER_VOTE_DONE: Thanks for voting. Be sure to brag about it on social media.
